name: News15-KADNKLAFNews
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Get the latest Lafayette and Acadiana area news, weather forecasts, Saints, LSU and high school sports, community events and breaking news, including New Iberia, St. Martinville, Ville Platte, Opelousas, Abbeville, Henderson, Crowley, Jennings, Lake Arthur, Eunice, Oberlin and more.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
